text: يوم ينفخ فى الصور فتاتون افواجا

translations.translation: the Day the Trumpet is blown and you come in droves,
The day the trumpet blast is sounded you will come in hordes;
the Day when the Trumpet shall be blown, and you will come forth in multitudes;
On that day the trumpet will be sounded and you will come (to Us) in huge groups.
The day when the Trumpet will be blown – you will therefore come forth in multitudes.
The Day when the Trumpet will be blown, and you shall come forth in crowds.
The day on which the trumpet shall be blown so you shall come forth in hosts,
the day the Trumpet is blown, and you shall come in troops,
A day when the trumpet is blown and ye come in multitudes,
On that Day when the trumpet shall be sounded, you shall come in droves,
It is a Day whereon the trumpet will be blown, and ye will come in multitudes.
the day the Trumpet will be blown, and you will come in groups,
The Day that the Trumpet shall be sounded, and ye shall come forth in crowds;
The Day when the Trumpet will be blown, and you shall come forth in crowds (groups);
the Day that the Horn is blown, and you shall come in crowds
The Day when the Trumpet is blown, and you will come in droves.
The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes

[78:18] the day the Trumpet, the Horn, is blown (yawma yunfakhu fī’l-sūri is either a substitution for, or an explication of, yawma’l-fasli, ‘the Day of Decision’, the blower being Isrāfīl) and you come, forth from your graves to the site [of the Resurrection], in droves, in diverse groups,
(A day when the trumpet is blown) the blowing of the resurrection, (and ye come in multitudes) host after 723 host and group after group,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجاً } معناه جَماعاتٌ

translations.translation: And His saying, {Then you will come in troops}, means groups.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
للحشر { فَتَأْتُونَ } المحشر { أَفْوَاجاً } [النبأ: 18] زمراً زمراً
 فرقاً فرقاً

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
والفاء في قوله تعالى: { فتأتون } فصيحة تفصح عن جملة حُذفت ثقةً بدلالة الحال عليها
 وإيذاناً بغاية سرعة الإتيان
 كما في قوله تعالى:
[الشعراء:63] أي: فتبعثون من قبوركم فـتأتون عقب ذلك من غير لبث { أفواجاً } جماعات مختلفة الأحوال
 متباينة
 الأوضاع
 حسب اختلاف أعمالكم وتباينها
 مِن راكب
 وطائر
 وماش خفيف وثقيل
 ومكب على وجهه وغير ذلك من الأحوال العظيمة
 أو: أمماً
 كل أمة مع رسولها
 كما في قوله تعالى:
[الكهف:47]
